title: Desktop 6-Axis Robotic Arm
summary: A 3D printed, desktop-sized robotic arm capable of lifting ~1.5 lb. Features 6 degrees of freedom and custom control software.

title: Minimal Task Tracker
summary: A clean, distraction-free task management app built with React and TypeScript. Focuses on simplicity and keyboard shortcuts.

title: Computer Vision Playground
summary: Collection of computer vision experiments and demos using OpenCV and Python. Includes object detection, face recognition, and more.
